thread.title: Republican Wins Virginia State House Seat on Drawing of Lots

author: wsjcom
title: Republican Wins Virginia State House Seat on Drawing of Lots
text:
Republican David Yancey was declared the winner of a Virginia state House of Delegates race so close that its outcome was determined by pulling the candidateâ€™s name out of a bowl.
The Virginia State Board of Elections on Thursday named Mr. Yancey as the victor in the race for the 94th District seat.
The race between Mr. Yancey, a three-term... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
